"In order for this app to scan your device's storage for audio media and display " "them for you to edit, you need to give this app storage permission.\n" "This is optional, you can ignore this notice and open the audio media by clicking " "the pin button on the main screen of the app.\n" "Also, whenever you want, you can give this permission to the app or revoke it from " "the app."

"In order for this app to be able to change the default %1$s of your device, you need to " "give this app change system settings permission.\n" "We only use this permission to change the ringtone and notification sound of the " "device and you can revoke it from the app whenever you want.\n" "You can also change the ringtone manually from your device settings."

"In order for this app to be able to change the ringtone of your contacts, you need to " "give this app contacts permission.\n" "We only use this permission to change the ringtone of the contact selected by you and you " "can revoke it from the app whenever you want.\n"
